title: Hot Spinach, Artichoke, and Swiss Cheese Dip

Ingredients.3: 1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained

Ingredients.4: 1 (10 ounce) can water-packed artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Blend mayonnaise, Swiss cheese, spinach, artichoke hearts, and onion in a food processor. Spoon into a baking dish.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top and continue to bake until lightly browned and bubbly, about 25 more minutes.
